references.paper_title: Is MAP decoding all you need? The inadequacy of the mode in neural machine translation
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Minimum Bayes Risk (MBR) decoding for neural machine translation, which is the central focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: High quality rather than high model probability: Minimum Bayes risk decoding with neural metrics
references.reason: This paper significantly advances the field by showing the improvements in translation quality achievable by using MBR decoding with neural utility metrics.

references.paper_title: MetricX-23: The Google submission to the WMT 2023 metrics shared task
references.reason: The MetricX metric used in the main paper is described and evaluated in this highly relevant, contemporary work.

references.paper_title: Exact matrix completion via convex optimization
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in matrix completion, a technique heavily leveraged in the main paper for efficiently approximating MBR decoding.

references.paper_title: Alternating least-squares for low-rank matrix reconstruction
references.reason: The Alternating Least Squares (ALS) algorithm, a core component of the proposed method in the main paper, is described and analyzed in this important reference.
